2200.name: Unknown
2200.message:
Unable to connect to the proxy server.

Please check that the proxy-server
settings on your Wii U console are
correct.

To do so, select System Settings ⇒
Internet ⇒ Connect to the Internet, and
then open the Connections list. Next,
select the appropriate network from that
list, and then select Change Settings ⇒
Proxy Settings to check your settings.

If it is not possible to connect using
a PC or other device with the same
settings, the settings on the proxy
server itself may be incorrect, so
please check them as well.
2200.short_solution: Make sure your console is in range of your Wi-Fi network, and check the settings are correct. Make sure the 'Default' connection in Internet Settings is set correctly.
